pkgmetadata.longdescription: Run Once and Save Result // Package 'runonce' helps automating the saving of long-running code to help running the same code multiple times. If you run some long-running code once, it saves the result in a file on disk. Then, if the result already exists, i.e. if the code has already been run and its output has already been saved, it just read the result from the stored file instead of running the code again.
